content.prompt: If the price of a firm’s variable input increases, which of the following will occur?

choices.label: The firm will decrease its level of production.
The price of the good will decrease in the short run.
The firm’s marginal costs will decrease at every level of output.
The firm’s average fixed cost will decrease.
More firms will enter the industry in the long run.

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
